description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Korolevu, Fiji. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Five-Star Fiji Coral Coast Oasis with Daily Breakfast & 2 Kids Stay, Play & Eat Free
hotels.description: Surround yourself with the unsurpassed beauty of Fiji’s Coral Coast, where glistening waters, towering palm trees and white sandy beaches provide the perfect setting for an unforgettable escape at the five-star Warwick Fiji. Splash about in the family pool or relax in the adults-only corner, and feel the warm tropical breeze wash over you. Unwind and experience ultimate relaxation at Warwick Fiji’s superior spa - perched on the edge of the ocean overlooking a serene lagoon. Onsite restaurants include the famed Wicked Walu, Japanese restaurant Sazanami, Italian eatery Pappagallo and the buffet-style Bula Brasserie. The Kids’ Club will delight little ones with sandcastle building and treasure hunting, while kayaking, snorkelling, and stand-up paddleboarding is available to the older kids.

seo.title: Hotel a Korolevu - Fiji Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Korolevu, Fiji con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
